protocols.name: Order Tracking
protocols.description: Guides users through tracking their order status.

tabs.label: Overview
tabs.content: This protocol explains how to check real-time order updates.

tabs.label: Steps
tabs.content: 1. Enter order ID. 2. Check status on dashboard. 3. Contact support if delayed.

protocols.name: Order Cancellation
protocols.description: Details the process to cancel an order before shipping.

tabs.label: Overview
tabs.content: This protocol covers cancellation eligibility and timelines.

tabs.label: Steps
tabs.content: 1. Confirm order status. 2. Submit cancellation request. 3. Receive confirmation.

protocols.name: Device Troubleshooting
protocols.description: Assists users in resolving common device issues.

tabs.label: Overview
tabs.content: This protocol provides steps to diagnose and fix device problems.

tabs.label: Steps
tabs.content: 1. Restart device. 2. Check for updates. 3. Run diagnostic tool.

protocols.name: Account Recovery
protocols.description: Helps users regain access to their accounts.

tabs.label: Overview
tabs.content: This protocol outlines account recovery options and requirements.

tabs.label: Steps
tabs.content: 1. Verify identity. 2. Reset password. 3. Confirm account access.
